mapper.update: UPDATE SCM_ZSJ_ProductFirst SET productId=#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ownerId=#{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approvalId=#{approvalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approvalState=#{approvalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplierId=#{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier=#{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approvalCode=#{approvalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approvalValidity=#{approvalValidity,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, businessScope=#{businessScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmp=#{gmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmpValidity=#{gmpValidity,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, startBatch=#{startBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qualityStandard=#{qualityStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, length=#{length,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, wide=#{wide,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, high=#{high,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, volume=#{volume,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, roughWeight=#{roughWeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, cartonBarcode=#{cartonBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smallBarcode=#{smallBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id=#{id}
